name: RemindMe
author: Sazmap
short: Waits the period of time specified, and then reminds the user of the message
description:
Reply to a message that you wish to be reminded of, and enter

remindme . Bot will wait for that long and then remind the user. Duration is in form [j y[ears]] [k mo[nths]] [l d[ays]] [m h[ours]] [n m[inutes]] [o s[econds]]
install_msg:
Thanks for installing RemindMe!

help should have all the information you need
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not persistently store data or metadata about users.
